## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7db05a5d64874997de6e3b7b8770c5f6b9fad4c110015930551f6d1c9b139ab8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'myconfusedfunctionpoctestpackage' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
